about.technologies: Technologies I have been working with:

experiences.expDilepix: Developed and designed the multi-language web application for Dilepix. This application is designed to facilitate the transmission of various types of data, ranging from images to videos. Data is monitored through a dashboard, where users can perform various actions, including CRUD operations. Additionally, the application offers other functionalities, such as the ability to visualize analyses through customizable graphs.
experiences.expGZ: Mobile application available on Android and iOS stores. I Developed and designed the mobile application for Génération Zhéros. This application offers an individual coaching that daily guides you towards your own sustainable development journey via different quiz and functionalities. I was also in charge of the development of the MongoDB database, the administration dashboard using Laravel | VueJS and the Wordpress website.
